nodes.bodyText: can't we do this at our default.json?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -260,6 +260,7 @@
                                 <replace file="target/wso2carbon-core-${carbon.kernel.version}/repository/conf/carbon.xml" token="${product.version}" value="${project.version}" />
                                 <replace file="../p2-profile-gen/target/wso2carbon-core-${carbon.kernel.version}/repository/resources/conf/templates/repository/conf/carbon.xml.j2" token="${product.version}" value="{{product.version}}" />
                                 <replace file="../p2-profile-gen/target/wso2carbon-core-${carbon.kernel.version}/repository/resources/conf/default.json" token="${product.version}" value="${project.version}" />
+                                <replace file="../p2-profile-gen/target/wso2carbon-core-${carbon.kernel.version}/repository/resources/conf/default.json" token=""authorization_manager.properties.GroupAndRoleSeparationEnabled": "false"" value=""authorization_manager.properties.GroupAndRoleSeparationEnabled": "true"" />

nodes.bodyText:
also, we need to follow the toml convention for this key. Would need to change this or add a mapping so that it would be,
group_and_role_separation_enabled
